title: Online Intensive Training for Clinical Pharmacists: Leadership Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental pharmaceutical practice experience and comprehension of clinical environments
context.additional_context: Program designed to address the absence of leadership education in Nigerian pharmacy curricula, aiming to cultivate clinical problem-solving skills among practicing professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three defects in the patient treatment process in clinical settings
Learners can develop leadership-based project plans to resolve identified problems
Learners can discuss effective problem-solving strategies with peer practitioners using online collaboration tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
